select-credential.label: Select credential type
select-credential.description: Please select the credential type you wish to receive from an issuer.

select-issuer.label: Select issuer
select-issuer.description: Please select the issuer you request the credential from.

no-connected-issuers.title: You are not connected to any issuer!
no-connected-issuers.description: Please go to the Issuer page and connect with an issuer.

card.confirm: With clicking “confirm” the issuer is informed about your request.

success-card.title: Your request has been sent
success-card.description: Your request will be sent to the issuer. Once the credential has been issued to you we will inform you by e-mail about the result of the verification.
